short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start every new tab with a beautiful quote and the current time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Experience a minimalist and stunning new tab every time you open your browser. Dive into a tranquil blue color scheme that is pleasantly appealing.

🌊 Each new tab greets you with an inspiring quote, a breathtaking image, and the current time, giving you exactly what you need.

🕰️ Embrace simplicity and beauty with ZenTab!
